Name: Covid Tale: Ignorance
About the game: Re-live the COVID19 events from a different perspective. Namely in third-person perspective and behind your computer. Sit back and find out how it all may or may not happened. You'll be playing as a different characters in a story-driven adventure which sums up events that happened so far. Play familiar mini-games while unraveling how it could have happened according to a scientists, internet, Hollywood etc. It has sketch-like feeling but it maintains a story arc from start to finish. At the end, we will reveal HOW IT ACTUALLY HAPPENED. Key Features Non-combat story-driven experience Tolerable pixel art graphics Familiar, but sometimes clunky minigames It's a classic RPG Maker game without the RPG element Inappropriate politically incorrect humor Around 30+ minutes of playtime. Depending on your skill I do realize that COVID19 is a serious matter. Many people are suffering because of it. Don't underestimate it. Follow the instructions of WHO to protect yourself and others. Like the game? Find out more about PERSONALIZED GAMES like this at BDAYGAME website.
